Title: Prohibits service charges by gas companies for the repair, inspection, maintenance or remedies of damage
Summary: Prohibits service charges by gas companies for the repair, inspection, maintenance or remedies of damage to apparatus or personal property.
LawCode: Amd ยง65, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to prohibiting service charges by gas companies for repair, inspection, maintenance or remedies of damage
